author: EXM7777
text:
the easiest way to make progress in anything is volume:

this is the exact approach i had with this twitter account... i just posted 7-10 tweets a day for 7 months and look at the results now

3 reasons why volume is mandatory:
- you need minimum viable volume to know if it works
- being seen creates opportunities you didn't plan for
- adopting the scientist mindset means you need data to improve

everyone wants the "perfect strategy" & nobody wants to do 100 reps to find it

just do the work, collect the data and then make it better
